personal.name: Sayani Maity
personal.title: Digital Forensics & Ethical Hacking Student
personal.about: I am SAYANI MAITY, currently pursuing B.Sc. in Digital Forensics (2023-2026) at the Indian School Of Ethical Hacking (ISOEH) under MAKAUT, West Bengal. I specialize in Digital Forensics, Penetration Testing, OSINT, and Cybersecurity tooling.

education.institution: St. Thomas' High School, Howrah, West Bengal
Indian School of Ethical Hacking (ISOEH) under MAKAUT, West Bengal (2023–2026)

projects.title: Basic Strong Password Generator
projects.description: A simple Python script to generate a strong random password of desired length using uppercase, lowercase, digits, and special characters.

projects.title: Caesar Cipher Generator
projects.description: Implements Caesar Cipher encryption and decryption with auto-brute-force functionality for cybersecurity learning and practice.

projects.title: CMTL — CyberSec Multi-Tool Launcher
projects.description: A unified GUI-based cybersecurity tool launcher integrating scanners, forensic tools, and vulnerability assessment tools in one platform.

projects.title: AI-Powered Phishing Email Detector (In Development)
projects.image: assets/AI- powered Phishing Email Detector (In Development).jpg
projects.description: An AI + NLP-based phishing email detection system that analyzes email headers and contents to detect suspicious activity.
